abstract: French estimate of total Allied and German casualties; French and German estimates on submarine and ship losses
snippet: PARIS, Dec. 31 (UP)--Summarizing losses of the war thus far, French quarters today estimated the total casualties of the Allies and Germans at 9,604 men, with the dead and wounded of the war at sea and in the air more than double those of the West...

headline.main: ALLIES AND GERMANY LOST 9,604 FIGHTERS; French Report Greatest Casualties at Sea and in Air

lead_paragraph: PARIS, Dec. 31 (UP)--Summarizing losses of the war thus far, French quarters today estimated the total casualties of the Allies and Germans at 9,604 men, with the dead and wounded of the war at sea and in the air more than double those of the Western Front.
